description: This is a website for NRC Education Group, a UK-based consultancy firm, designed to provide services for students.
Students can submit documents and access courses or universities through this website.
Users can submit documents to apply as an agent.
Students can gain detailed knowledge about English tests.
A complete system has been developed for admin/super admin to manage various website data.

technology.frontend: Next.js, Vanilla CSS, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit
technology.backend: Express, MongoDB, Cloudinary, Multer, Nodemailer, TypeScript
technology.hosting: Frontend hosted on Vercel, server hosted on Railway
